i like being weird.

participant_2.background:
I like to eat the skin of the apple, but my family is not fond of it.
i like to build things.
my favorite band is the avert brother.
My favorite websites are the ones that help me learn about skiing and the mountains.
I love to share my short films with my friends and get their feedback.

content.text: Hey, not much just working on my short film.
Oh, that's cool. What's it about?
It's about a group of friends who go on a ski trip and have a lot of adventures.
That sounds really fun. I love skiing.
Me too! I love the adrenaline rush.
Yeah, it's so much fun to go fast down the mountain.
I know right! It's so exhilarating.
What's your favorite part about skiing?
I think my favorite part is the feeling of freedom you get when you're skiing.
That's a great answer! I love that feeling too.
Hey, I've got to run now. It was nice chatting with you!
You too! Have a good day!
